attributes.action: All chart in online games should be treated with the same rules as forums
attributes.additional_details:
Whilst forum owners have to deal with issues of bullying and harrasement, there are no rules for these problems with online games.

Therefore, I propose that all online games which have a chat facility should be treated as the same as forums, with the game publishers held responsable for all instances of bullying, harassment and victimisation.

rejection.details: Forums are regulated by a voluntary code.  However, existing laws (hate crime etc) cover all electronic communication.
